message.content:
cs.GT, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with a mechanism design problem in facility location, which involves strategic agents reporting their preferences. This falls under the category of algorithmic game theory (cs.GT). The problem also involves locating facilities based on reports, which is a classic problem in data structures (cs.DS). The paper proposes a mechanism that adapts to the size of the instance, which involves making decisions based on the input size, and this falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also presents tight bounds for the mechanism, which involves analyzing the performance of the mechanism, and this falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and information theory (cs.IT).
